title: Felixou's thumbnails
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:hansarp]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]

[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bahiana&display=swap');

:root{
--white: 244, 244, 244;
--dark: 46, 14, 2;
--medium-accent: 212, 104, 0;
--bright-accent: 242, 133, 0;
--toggle-roundness: 0;
--swatch-text-light: var(--white);
--swatch-menutxt-light-color: var(--white);
--link-color: 242, 133, 0;
--visited-link-color: 189, 107, 0;
--borderColor: #ff8c00 !important;
}
#header {
     --header-h1-font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size)*3.25);
     --header-title: "FELIXOU ARTPAGE";
     --header-title-mobile: "ARTPAGE";
     --swatch-headerh1-color: var(--bright-accent);

.tooltip {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: transform .16s;
}
#page-content .tooltip > a[href*="dark-achievement-badges"] {
  box-shadow: none!important;
}
.tooltip .tooltiptext {
  width: 120px;
  background-color: #21252E;
  color: #f8f8f8;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 5px;
  border-radius: 6px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 95px;
  left: calc(50% - 5px);
  margin-left: -60px;
  z-index: 2;
  visibility: hidden;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
}
.tooltip .tooltiptext::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 100%;
    left: 50%;
    margin-left: -5px;
    border-width: 5px;
    border-style: solid;
    border-color: transparent transparent #21252E transparent;
}
.tooltip:hover {
    transform: scale(1.6);
    z-index: 2;
}
.tooltip:hover > a {
   background: transparent;
}
.tooltip:hover .tooltiptext {
  visibility: visible;
  opacity: 1;
}
[[/module]]

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/felixouartpage/error.png
|caption=Felixou's Thumbnails
|width=100%
|align=center]]
[[/div]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

= So.

= I did thumbnails for my articles on my [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/felixoupage author page], because it looked cool. Apparently, some people liked that. I later asked a bunch of authors to send me their articles so I can do more thumbnails and do an artpage. Here we are.

= They were fun to make, and I hope you'll like them too.

[[span class="tooltip"]][[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/felixouartpage/author.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3086"]][[/span]]
